;Time

;

;In 2020, director Zhang Lu returned to Beijing from South Korea and was quarantined in a hotel in Guangzhou for two weeks in accordance with the COVID-19 prevention and control policy at the time. He wrote a script and sent it to Xin Baiqing, saying that the protagonist Gu Wentong was written for him.

;

;Gu Wentong is from Beijing. He is divorced. His daughter is fostered at his sister’s house. He lives in the old house left by his mother. He has an affair with a young girl and then separates. His best friend as a boy is in a foreign country. suicide. This person who once wrote poetry now makes a living by writing articles about food. He wanders the streets and alleys of Beijing, lonely, and has a sense of drifting that cannot be stabilized.

;

;Actor Xin Baiqing previously collaborated with Zhang Lu in "The Long Confession" (2021) - the brothers Lichun and Lidong went to Japan from Beijing to find Yanagawa, a girl with whom they had a bond when they were young. Having something on your mind. Xin Baiqing plays Li Chun, who already has a family. He goes to a foreign country and hides his loneliness and discomfort in a nonchalant way. He said, "Director Zhang Lu prefers to write about people who have a sense of wandering and loneliness."

;

;Xin Baiqing let Zhang Lu see this feeling at a certain moment when Xin Baiqing was resting or lost in thought on the set.

;

;Gu Wentong lives next to the White Tower, and Xin Baiqing also grew up in Beijing. Zhang Lu once said that Xin Baiqing has the "not anxiousness" of an old Beijinger. People who are not in a hurry seem to be taking things too slowly, have heavier traces of time on their bodies, and have a closer relationship with the past than those who keep running forward.

;

;Gu Wentong in "The Light of the White Tower" looks like a man trapped in time. He wears lazy cloth shoes, only a ginger corduroy jacket and a floppy backpack. Most of the time Walking, occasionally taking the bus, and eating braised food that "only people over fifty years old miss" are separated from everything that is happening at the moment, and I am used to saying sorry to everyone.

;

;"Why do I look at such a person more often?" Zhang Lu said in an interview with "Watching Movies", "Because for this kind of person, the past time is still there, and the present time is still there. Subtle changes have occurred, and two things from time are squeezing on him."

;

;For Gu Wentong, the past time and the present state are both related to the missing father: the five-year-old In 2006, my father was accused of molesting a woman on the bus and my mother kicked him out of the house. When he reached middle age, he suddenly received news that his father's "hooligan crime" was an unjust case. For so many years, his father had been watching him from a distance.

;

;The scene of reconciliation between father and son was brief. The two danced a ballroom dance in a simple room accompanied by DVD footage from the last century.

;

;Two grown men dancing together is not a Chinese way of expressing emotions, let alone Xin Baiqing's. He asked Zhang Lu, how to dance? Zhang Lu said that he can dance when the time comes. He asked Tian Zhuangzhuang, who played the father, that he could understand all the scenes in the script and could imagine the final appearance, but the dancing scene was weird. Tian Zhuangzhuang also said that there will be a solution on that day.

;

;When that day came, Xin Baiqing said one line first: Dad, stand up. The two of them jumped stiffly a few times. Xin Baiqing said to Tian Zhuangzhuang, Dad, the blood vessels in your hands are like earthworms - this is what his daughter said to Gu Wentong before.

;

;Tian Zhuangzhuang glanced at his hand, and then put his hand on Xin Baiqing's shoulder. Dancing comes naturally.

;

;That’s right, Xin Baiqing sighed. "With this one action, my father's emotions for so many years fell into his hands and onto my shoulders. This action is small, but it contains too much content." He thought, "When you go straight to the result and the goal, When you are doing this, you will wonder why it is so difficult? But forget about the result and purpose, and when you enjoy the process and express it, the results will appear naturally."

;

;;

;

;Movie "The Light of the White Tower" Stills ;;

;

;People's Insurance Drama

;

;On October 27, 2023, "The Light of the White Tower" will be released. The film was shortlisted for the main competition of the 73rd Berlin Film Festival at the beginning of the year. In April, director Zhang Lu attended the "Light of the White Tower" post-screening event at the Beijing Film Festival and commented, "Xin Baiqing's performance is self-evident. It's easy to win awards for hard-working performances. Xin Baiqing deserves the award."< /p>;

;In terms of fame, Xin Baiqing may not be a first-line star actor. In some years, he did not have many film and television works. But in the movie "Legend of the Demon Cat" (2017), in just a few scenes, the audience was completely attracted by his performance as Li Bai.

;

;He only has one scene in the script: Gao Lishi carries Li Bai to the Banquet of Bliss. Li Bai was drunk and composed a poem, "The clouds want the clothes and the flowers want the face." Drunkness is the keynote. Xin Baiqing thought, does he really want to act drunk? "My understanding of Li Bai is that it was a period when Li Bai was particularly sober, because all his illusions about his official career had been shattered. Everyone was praising him for being a high official. He knew very well that it was over." To have Drunk state, but you must be sober and cannot act drunk.

;

;On the set, director Chen Kaige said that there would be no need to walk in the scene later, and he would just shoot it directly. Great, Xin Baiqing later said, "I am willing to collide with the most vivid things."

;

;The first shot was passed in one go. When he got to the monitor, Chen Kaige first said something off-topic, "We have to cooperate in the future"; then he showed Xin Baiqing the monitor: Xin Baiqing sat up, stretched out, and rubbed against the golden tortoise, and then asked Concubine Yang Youyou ,who are you?

;

;Chen Kaige said, this is Li Bai.

;

;TV drama viewers may have known Xin Baiqing through "Happiness is Like a Flower" (2005) in the early years or "Da Qin Fu" (2020) in recent years. The role that really makes him remembered is Zhou Bingyi in the period drama "Human World" (2022) - the eldest brother in an ordinary family in Northeast China: sent to the countryside as an educated youth, admitted to Peking University, and later became an official with outstanding contributions during the reform and opening up period. The shadow of many people in special times.

;

;Screenwriter Wang Haiyu received an invitation to adapt and read Liang Xiaosheng’s original novel. He felt that the description of Zhou Bingyi was relatively thin, such as the process of demolishing the "Guangzi Film" in the shantytown where he grew up after he took over the government. Passed a few pens. In Wang Hailu’s story, his younger brother Zhou Bingkun represents the family (;the grassroots people;), and his older brother Zhou Bingyi represents the country (;Government officials;) are the backbone. So she put a lot of effort into writing the scene after Zhou Bingyi became a leading cadre. "If I have to say it, the first half of this play is Zhou Bingkun's home court, and the second half is Zhou Bingyi's home court," she said.

;

;About halfway through the broadcast of "Human World", Wang Hailu and Xin Baiqing met at an event. Zhou Bingyi's highlight hasn't been aired yet. Wang Haiyuan doesn't know what Xin Baiqing can do. The two parties only exchanged a few polite words. She seemed to have heard Xin Baiqing say, "This script is very literary." She thought this was just a polite comment. .

;

;After watching the complete drama, Wang Hailu regretted not chatting more with Xin Baiqing, "This is such a good actor."

;

;"A brief example: watching the demolition of shantytowns in the drama Before that scene, I was a little nervous. I gave Zhou Bingyi a few thousand words of lines for that scene. When the plot came to that point, I could only write it like this. I thought the director might have a way to reduce the difficulty of performing this scene during filming. ——I didn’t dare to expect the actor to fulfill his wish. At that time, I had the impression that Xin Baiqing was a niche actor in literary films. ——Unexpectedly, the ten-minute scene was filmed in one shot. Xin Baiqing used his His understanding of the characters, his talent in temperament, and his line skills have successfully endowed him with the real nobility that a ruler should have."

;

;More than a year has passed since the premiere of "Human World", and Zhou Bingyi was demolished in a shanty town. Clips of handling disputes on the spot and explaining policies to neighborhood friends whom he has known since childhood are still circulated on self-media and have become classic examples of both performance and speech. Wang Haiyuan started her career as a novelist, and was later transferred to the General Political Repertory Theater to do drama. She said, "At that time, I often heard senior teachers say that the theater protects the people, and the people protect the opera. The success of Zhou Bingyi's character must be the people protect the opera."

;

;;

;

;A person

; < p>;After "The Human World", Xin Baiqing received a large number of official roles. But he doesn't want to be typecast. Only fresh roles can arouse his curiosity. He filmed the first feature film "Three Decades" by documentary director Xu Tong, playing the villain Yan Yonggang, and starring with Duan Yihong who played the policeman Jia Guozhi. In the prosperous era, Yan Yonggang injured policeman Jia Guozhi during a pursuit. Jia was not killed, and Yan was not arrested. A blood feud was formed, but a sympathy for each other was born.

;

;In his original novel "Jinbao Island", Xu Tong wrote about Yan Yonggang, a son of an official, like this: his actions are dark, his person is fair, and he has a sinister aura.

;

;Xu Tong and Xin Baiqing went to the writer Acheng's house to discuss the adaptation of "Zhenbao Island". That was the first time he met Xin Baiqing. As soon as he parked the car, he saw Xin Baiqing arriving in an SUV behind him. Alone, no team, no assistant. "I felt very comfortable at that time. He was very natural and alone. He didn't have the habits of the entertainment industry or the behavior of actors."

;

;After meeting at Acheng's house, Ah Cheng Cheng told Xu Tong, pay attention, Bai Qing is holding her breast.

;

;Xu Tong later observed carefully that Xin Baiqing had no breasts at all. He was about 1.8 meters tall and stood straight. Xu Tong asked Xin Baiqing, has he always been in this shape? Xin Baiqing said yes. It has been like this for decades, and he is neither fat nor thin at all.

;

;Xu Tong understood that Acheng was not referring to the body shape, but to the impression that Xin Baiqing was holding her breasts. "Because of his thin temperament and subtlety." Similarly, Xu Tong found that Xin Baiqing had a special look in his eyes, "He looks at things, not directly with his eyes shining, but as if there is a gap between them. Layers of things, the light is recycled and contained inside."

;

;Aware of these two points, and looking at the characters created by Xin Baiqing, Xu Tong felt, "His expressions are moderate and at the same time full and full. It means that the thing behind his back is full." Chen Kaige had a similar evaluation of Xin Baiqing. He said that Xin Baiqing "eats very deeply and vomits very little."

;

;In the spring of 2022, "Three Decades" will start filming in Shaanxi. Xin Baiqing promised Xu Tong to join the group in advance and turned down other arrangements. "After he said the Spring Festival, I walked over." Xu Tong recalled, "Looking back on our work during that period, I feel that he is not an actor. He did not regard our cooperation as a project. He just Create a character. Familiarize yourself with the environment, enter the space, and then get into the character."

;

;There was a script reading before the start of filming, and everyone didn't talk much. Xu Tong said that Xin Baiqing and Duan Yihong had already turned the characters over and over. If you understand everything thoroughly and talk too much, it will affect the spontaneity of the scene. He described the performances of the two actors as "very exciting and very surprising".

;

;Although they were happy to work together, Xu Tong and Xin Baiqing did not interact much after that drama. Part of the reason is Xu Tong's intention. "I need to keep a distance from the actors in order to create a sense of strangeness. Having too many personal relationships will affect my imagination of the characters in the future."

;

;He feels that Xin Baiqing is more I understand this, so I rarely appear outside of the role. "If the audience is too familiar with your face, when you create a character again, the credibility of that character will be reduced, or the impact will be lost." It will decrease." A good actor needs to maintain a considerable degree of solitude.

;

;;

;

;"三板AX ”

;

;The partners of Xin Baiqing we found are very willing to talk about his performances, but it is not easy to talk about performances with him himself. Like Zhang Lu said, he was holding on to his mouth; or like Xu Tong That said, he was recycling it.

;

;Rather than describing his mental journey in detail, he would rather summarize it this way:

;

;“My working method is to try my best to turn literary descriptions into visual images. The first step is my Where does the image come from? What does he look like, what is his hairstyle, what clothes he wears, whether he wears glasses, the way he walks, the way he talks, and whether he has any habitual movements. In fact, these are all learned when he was in school. The most basic. Then, some of the background of the script is not written in the script, but I want to give him some rich emotional relationships, or some experiences, so that I can imagine a deeper dimension for this character. After the performance, This character will not be so one-sided and single, and the audience will feel that he may have more aspects and three-dimensionality."

;

;"The basic skill of this actor is to observe life, there are no other skills, nothing new The content is all three-dimensional, but you have to do these three things in a down-to-earth manner, that is, the actor is armed to the teeth."

;

;It is by relying on these three things that he leaves his comfort time and time again. District and meet the challenges of new roles. "When I take a role, I only consider whether I am interested in it, not whether I can control it. When I see a new role and I can't control it, I stop acting, and there will never be any progress."

;

;At first glance Look, Li Chun in "The Long Confession" looks nothing like Xin Baiqing. Producer Xu Jiahan recalled that the first actor selected by the crew was Zhang Luyi, who will play the younger brother Lidong, a somewhat stubborn middle-aged literary artist suffering from cancer. They asked Zhang Luyi, find yourself a brother, who is suitable? Brother Lichun is a bit like the opposite of Lidong, secular and open-minded.

;

;Zhang Luyi replied: Xin Baiqing. He felt that Xin Baiqing was a bit "sultry".

;

;So there was the first collaboration between Xin Baiqing and director Zhang Lu. In a scene, in a Japanese B&B, Li Chun and his young lover Yanagawa sat opposite each other and talked, and Xin Baiqing burst into tears, "It was telling and repenting. I felt that kind of expression was particularly clear."

;

;Zhang Lu yelled, come on, one more line, and asked Xin Baiqing to say his lines to the wall. "I thought at the time, wasn't the one just now bad? Of course I didn't discuss it with the director. Since there is already a stronger expression, I will repeat what the director said." In the next line, Xin Baiqing turned his back to the camera and muttered to himself.

;

;In the finished film, Zhang Lu used the latter one. Xin Baiqing thought, yes, Lichun may have feelings for Yanagawa, or maybe he just came here to find himself. "And my kind of performance limits all possibilities to one, but makes the road narrower.";

;Xin Baiqing quickly understood Zhang Lu's style. He said that watching Zhang Lu's movies is like reading poetry, and there is no standard answer. When I interviewed Zhang Lu at the end of 2020, he indeed said that movies should be like poetry.

;

;For the role of Li Chun, Xin Baiqing won the China Film Golden Rooster Award for Best Supporting Actor.

;

;By the time of "The Light of the White Tower", the two had a very good understanding and didn't have too much discussion. Zhang Lu would ask him if he felt comfortable acting? Quite comfortable. That’s it, take the next one.

;

;"The so-called comfort (means), I think everything is right. There is no 'strange' in this scene, there is no such uncomfortable and difficult movements, behaviors, and tone. It is waves. It is a calm, still and deep expression of expression, rather than which note pops up and becomes stronger; which note becomes deeper. Maybe it is used in this movie, and the comfortable feeling is like this." Xin Baiqing said .

;

;Being burdened with the dissatisfaction of the times and the family, in the ambiguous relationship between the sexes and the dramatic father-son relationship, the role of Gu Wentong has a lot to play. But Xin Baiqing knew that what Zhang Lu wanted was a performance that was not externalized, or even a non-acting one.

;

;"He often said that people in life are multi-faceted. You may be talking about something happily one second, but you may fall into a very self-conscious mood the next second. I don’t know why. People often get distracted and say nonsense. These are real life conditions."

;

;"This puts higher demands on performers. Not acting requires a particularly strong inner concentration, otherwise you will feel that I am wrong if I don’t act? But precisely when I don’t doubt myself and am particularly determined, another unspeakable state may arise. The audience It will be captured. If you don’t act, you may need to be more fulfilled in your heart. This enrichment does not mean that your purpose is more fulfilling, but that your past life, experience, your temperament, and the connotation of your thoughts will be felt at that moment. ”

;

;On April 29, 2023, the closing ceremony and awards ceremony of the Beijing Film Festival was held. As Zhang Lu said, Xin Baiqing really won the award. He won the "Tiantan Award" for Best Actor for "The Light of the White Tower". This is his first movie award.

;

;;

;

;Stills from the drama "Hurry Up";(provided by interviewee/picture);

;

;Game sense

;

;In addition to film and television roles, Xin Baiqing has always been an actor at the National Theater. The first major theater play was director Tian Qinxin's "Hurry Up" (2001). He played the protagonist Tian Han. The play included self-narration that broke the fourth wall, emotions with his cousin, his wife, and his beauty, as well as several scenes in the play. For example, the Syrian boy in "Salome" translated by Tian Han and Guan Hanqing in the script written by Tian Han were both played by Xin Baiqing. Later, in "Red Rose and White Rose" (2007), he played "Liu Xiahui" known to all Shanghai. In "Four Generations Under One Roof" (2010), he played the role of Guan Xiaohe, who lives in an alley and seeks fame and wealth from the Japanese, and won the Drama Golden Lion Award for Performance. In "Green Snake" (2013), he played Fahai, who was both human and divine. In 2023, he will also play Su Shi in Tian Qinxin's new play "Spring Dawn on Su Di".

;

;Xin Baiqing remembers the words of director Tian Qinxin, whom he has collaborated with many times: The biggest difference between drama and film and television, or the biggest charm of drama is that it can be dressed up. Movies and TV dramas won’t look for Xin Baiqing, but Tian Qinxin will. "It feels very playful to dress up this character, and it makes me suddenly enlightened. It has become a fun thing. It doesn't mean that I have to go through all the trouble to create someone. The drama is as big as the sky." , such a big yoke is put on you, no.”

;

;In more than 20 years on the stage, Xin Baiqing’s roles are not many, and he can count them on two hands. Looking back now, every role has He could still recall the stories. Compared with film and television, drama is far away from fame and fortune. Xin Baiqing himself sometimes wonders why he has never left drama?

;

;"Fame and fortune may be just a moment. It's great that my play has become popular. It is recognized by so many people. I enjoy it very much, but it will pass soon. But acting in a play requires being in the rehearsal room every day. Rehearsing all the time, this kind of simple happiness is so rare. The older I get, the things, social environment, and relationships I face become more and more complicated. (Performing a play) This thing is not complicated. I can go back to simplicity If you find the place where you were when you were little, you will be particularly happy." Xin Baiqing said.

;

;"He has a very clean temperament. This kind of cleanliness is rare." Tian Qinxin said that in the rehearsal venue, she would sometimes be suddenly moved by Xin Baiqing.

;

;In 2017, the new version of "Kurst" was staged. Xin Baiqing went to watch it as an audience member and felt that the younger generation of actors performed better than himself. "When I was young, I was a bit heartless. I just had fun and played silly every day. I didn't care about my brain and didn't take things personally. Because it would be very painful if I pretended too much, you know?"

;

;"But there is no way, life is just stuffed into my arms, and I have stuffed a lot of it into my arms over the years."

;

;What has life stuffed into him?

;

;"Fire, rice, oil and salt are all put in it. You really can't tell the details. This is living and living."

;

;In the version of "Hurry" played by Xin Baiqing, there is a section where Tian Han Watching a theater in Tokyo, I read a confession, to the effect that I have found my passion, just like a planet has found its orbit: "I was confused when I was a child, and I probably can't understand it. I only love the color I want, I will let it pull out a track and lead me to revolve freely."

;

;I said this line and asked Xin Baiqing if it resonated with him when he was young, but he denied it.

;

;"When I was a child, I really didn’t know what it meant. I just pronounced the word out to compose a new word to express a state of sadness. What is life, what is pulling, what is my color. , I don’t know what I want. Now that I’ve reached this age, I know everything, and I don’t need to say such words anymore. I have all the insights, but it’s been a cold autumn.”

;

; Through his works, it is difficult to trace the trajectory of his climb in performance. Nor did he give a so-called “eureka moment.”

;

;"I understand your question, but there is no specific node. Because life itself has no nodes. My life is stable, but are you willing to experience the stable life with your heart? I have experienced it with my heart, age, age, and stability. What time brings to people will be subtle and accumulated little by little."

;

;He only said that if he plays Tian Han again now, it should be different.

;

;Blunt

;

;In 2008, when director Jiang Wei was filming "Latent", his first consideration was to cast Xin Baiqing and Zhu Yuanyuan to play the roles of Yu Zecheng and Cuiping. He felt that Xin Baiqing had some Literary popularity. Unfortunately, Zhu Yuanyuan was pregnant. Jiang Wei said that Xin Baiqing could go alone, but Xin Baiqing did not go to accompany the childbirth.

;

;After "Latent" was aired, it became a phenomenon-level TV series, winning awards all over the country. Xin Baiqing has regrets, but not regrets. This isn't the only time I've run into a favorite character.

;

;The role Xin Baiqing wanted to play most was Faust. In Goethe's play "Faust", the learned scholar makes a deal with the devil Mephistopheles, selling his soul in exchange for endless knowledge and wisdom, and willing to go to hell after death. Later, when someone actually approached him to play "Faust", he refused.

;

;"Why didn't I act when this opportunity came to me? I struggled for a long time, and then I realized that what I wanted to act was not Goethe's Faust." He couldn't say anything. Explaining what Faust he wanted to play, he knew what he didn’t want.

;

;“I feel quite blunt, and in life I feel that I am not very bright or very smart anyway.” Xin Baiqing said of himself. But he has his own little world. When he is particularly tired, or driving in a car, he watches other people play Four Kingdoms Army Chess on the Internet. Sometimes when he sees that the game is too bad, he also says that he can’t stand it anymore, so he closes it and clicks to play it again later. "Just like that, I am very happy in my heart, but when I communicate with others, I become a very boring person."

;

;Xin Baiqing likes diving. Putting his life on the bottom of the water, distracting thoughts were forced to be reduced to a minimum. The oxygen content, diving depth, and direction were all no problem. When he could finally relax and take a look at the bottom of the sea, he felt that it might be similar to the feeling of being in space, and he felt better. It becomes wider.

;

;Everyone who is an actor is sensitive, but sensitivity can sometimes hurt oneself. As an "introvert, not good at expressing people", Xin Baiqing uses this method to let himself go.

;

;Xu Jiahan is the producer of "The Long Confession" and "The Light of the White Tower". She said, "In real life, Teacher Bai Qing is very polite and harmonious with the crew. ""The Long Confession" was filmed in Japan. Xin Baiqing did not understand Japanese, but "will try his best to adapt and is unwilling to cause trouble to others."

;

;"But you always feel that he has a little secret, and he just happened to find an outlet in the script."

;

;In 1997, the 1993 undergraduate students of the Performance Department of the Central Academy of Drama were about to graduate and were rehearsing. During the break, a dozen classmates went to have lunch with the teacher. Walking in Dongmianhua Hutong in front of the school, the teacher asked, who among you can continue to act in dramas after graduation? The originally cheerful atmosphere suddenly became quiet. At that time, acting in a drama meant being poor, and no one said anything. Xin Baiqing added, "I would be happy to act in dramas for the rest of my life."

;

;In 2023, Xin Baiqing will be 50 years old, and some of his teachers at that time have passed away. Whenever he rehearses a play, attends a class reunion, or visits his teacher's grave, he will recall that scene.

;Micro short dramas are booming from all levels.

;

;In terms of market size, according to data from a third-party research report quoted by Chinese Online, the market size of short dramas in 2022 will be more than 10 billion yuan, and the scale of micro short dramas in 2023 is expected to exceed 30 billion yuan.  

;

;From the perspective of market supply, according to data from the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television, the number of micro-short dramas registered for the whole year in 2021 is 398, while the number of registered micro-short dramas in 2022 is close to 2,800, a year-on-year increase of 600%; March 2023 -In August, the number of national key online micro-short dramas that have been approved for planning and registration was basically over 260, and in July and August they were 361 and 401 respectively, indicating a significant increase in supply.

;

;From a company perspective, Chinese Online, Huace Film and Television, Mango Super Media, Huayi Brothers, Ningmeng Film and Television, Palm Reading Technology, and Changxin Media have all increased investment in this area.

;

;But on the other side, due to the "kitsch" of the subject matter, the market supervision of micro-short dramas still remains uncertain.

;

;On November 10, Chinese Online closed at 25.40 yuan per share, a decrease of 9.19%. Previously, from November 2 to 9, the company's stock price doubled in just 6 trading days.

;

;;;

;;The micro-short drama "Twenty-Nine" starring Yang Rong has been viewed more than 800 million times on Douyin short video platform. Image source: Poster from the show;

;

;"Comfortable and Intensive"

;

;The biggest feature of micro-short dramas is their high recycling efficiency.

;

;Chinese Online, a popular micro-short drama concept stock, stated in the investor exchange minutes that short dramas are characterized by short content and a large number of episodes, usually 80-100 episodes, each episode is less than two minutes, and the plot is It has strong drama, the creative content is more in line with the needs of the masses, the story is quick to reverse, and the plot is exciting and dense. Rely more on platform advertising to reach C-end customers.

;

;On this basis, micro-short dramas have a short commercial verification cycle and high recycling efficiency. They mainly rely on advertising. As long as the streaming side can achieve the first-day recycling target, they can continue to optimize the distribution strategy. Then achieve high ROI recovery. From script polishing to filming, production, and delivery verification, a work can complete verification and closed-loop in a short time, with a high asset transfer rate.

;

;At the same time, the production cycle of micro-short dramas is short, the production cost is low, and the shooting cycle is generally within a week.  

;

;“If it doesn’t work, just change the subject. The cost is too low. Just shoot for another.” A micro-short drama entrepreneur told a reporter from the 21st Century Business Herald.

;

;This allows Chinese online, which has a weak film and television foundation, to quickly enter the core track.

;

;"The company has the advantage of massive IP. At present, short drama scripts are mainly derived from adaptations of online novels. The company has 5.5 million IPs and can continuously provide high-quality short drama IP adapted scripts, with outstanding long-term running capabilities." Chinese online.

;

;Old content giant Huace Film and Television is also rapidly entering this market. The company disclosed that it began researching the short drama track in the second half of last year and started building teams in June this year. There are currently 6 teams, and it is also introducing screenwriters, producers, and cooperating with casting companies. "The future positioning is to enter the top five of micro-short dramas." Huace said. What it considers to be its advantage is obviously its production capabilities.

;

;Objectively, film and television giants still have advantages in laying out this track.

;

;According to Ningmeng Film and Television, at the beginning of 2023, its micro-short drama "Twenty-Nine" had a total playback volume of more than 800 million times on the Douyin short video platform, and the average playback volume of each episode exceeded 40 million times, related topics have been played a total of 1.45 billion times on the entire site, which is the highest level among Douyin short video micro-series.

;

;But at present, the biggest feature of micro-short dramas is their "refreshing feeling", and there seems to be little demand for high-quality productions. Everyone from micro-short drama entrepreneurs to middle-level executives of leading film and television companies admitted to 21st Century Business Herald reporters that the current advantages of leading film and television companies in this market are relatively limited.

;

;For example, after the second season of "Twenty-Nine" was released, it ranked TOP 1 on the most popular micro-short drama list and occupied the TOP 1 spot on Douyin's micro-short drama list for 5 consecutive weeks. However, the popularity has dropped significantly compared to the first season.

;

;;Platform Changes;

;

;Behind the popular short drama is a lonely long video.

;

;Many project leaders of film and television companies lamented to reporters from the 21st Century Business Herald that as platforms “reduce costs and increase efficiency,” it is becoming increasingly difficult to make money.

;

;The financial report shows that iQiyi’s content costs in 2022 will be 16.5 billion yuan, a year-on-year decrease of 20%. In addition, the company is also promoting self-produced dramas. At present, the proportion of iQiyi’s self-made content assets continues to rise, from 32% in 2018 to 63% in 2022. iQiyi also revealed that among the new key dramas released every year, the proportion of original content will increase from 20% in 2018 to more than 50% in 2022. All of the above have squeezed the profit margins of film and television projects.

;

;The incentive for this change is the fragile profit model of long videos.

;

;In the second quarter of this year, iQiyi’s revenue was 7.802 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 17.2%; net profit attributable to the parent company was 365 million yuan, compared with a net loss of 214 million yuan in the same period last year. But from a quarter-on-quarter perspective, iQiyi’s revenue is in a declining range. Driven by "Hurricane", in the first quarter, its revenue reached 8.349 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 15%; the net profit attributable to the parent company was 618.1 million yuan, while the net profit in the same period last year was 169.1 million yuan.

;

;The reason why the performance of long video is so volatile is that user demand is becoming fragmented and the monetization efficiency is relatively low.

;

;According to Analysys Qianfan data, in September 2023, iQiyi’s monthly active users dropped to 568.67 million, and Tencent Video’s monthly active users dropped to 450.17 million. During the same period, Douyin’s monthly active users dropped to 797.67 million, and Kuaishou’s monthly active users dropped to 522.36 million. The difference between long and short videos is obvious.

;

;In addition, from the perspective of advertising, advertisers are rushing to short videos due to higher monetization efficiency.

;

;Xiangpiaopiao disclosed that in the first half of the year, its frozen lemon tea sales increased by 547.09% year-on-year, and its online channels increased by 235% year-on-year. Douyin channels accounted for about 30%, and the cumulative repurchase rate remained high. Jinzai Food also stated that in terms of online channels, the company’s new media channels such as Douyin performed well, with a year-on-year increase of approximately 600%.

;

;The person in charge of the marketing department of a leading beverage company told a reporter from the 21st Century Business Herald that compared with long video platforms such as iQiyi, short videos have a more direct marketing effect and are much more efficient in monetization. “There are basically no big expectations for the monetization of long videos,” he said. Another founder of outdoor sports products also expressed similar views.

;

;Under the double attack of traffic and revenue, the long video ecology is moving towards the stock market.

;

;As a result, content companies have to rush to micro-short dramas.

;

;;"Uncertainty";

;

;However, the micro-short drama market is also facing various problems.

;

;A large number of film and television companies and even platforms are currently unwilling to be too high-profile in this business. The core lies in the policy instability of micro-short dramas.

;

;The standardized supervision of short dramas can be traced back to August 2020. The State Administration of Radio, Film and Television has added a rapid registration and filing module for online micro-short dramas to the key online film and television drama information filing system, marking the official inclusion of micro-short dramas into the supervision system. .

;

;In April 2022, the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television issued a document clarifying that the review of domestic online dramas, including short plays, will be included in the management of administrative licensing matters, and it is necessary to obtain a distribution license from the relevant radio and television administrative departments before they can be broadcast and released; In November, we issued an article to carry out special rectification of mini-program micro-drama.

;

;While guiding the standardized development, the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television also provides necessary support to short plays. In December 2022, the "Opinions on Promoting the Prosperous Development of Short Play Creation" proposed to cultivate and expand the main body of short play creation. Provide tilted support to short plays in terms of resources, talents, marketing, broadcasting, and publicity.  

;

;必须注意的是，目前，爽剧仍是该市场主流。据巨量引擎，当前短剧以“爽”为内核，90%的题材都以“爽”为主，爽的方式多样，包括战神、穿越、逆袭、重生等题材。由此，呈现“媚俗化”倾向。据21世纪经济报道记者了解，对于大量“擦边”内容，监管层正在关注中。

;

;“市场走向充满着不确定性。”多位行业上下游参与者如此表态。

;

;另从市场规模来看，微短剧相对长视频还是有限。

;

;在2022年，单爱奇艺一家营收就达到290亿元，同比下滑5%。这一数据，远超同年微短剧总体市场规模，且接近2023年微短剧预计规模。

;

;当下，短剧终端盈利主要分为三种。分别为会员付费、广告变现和电商带货。会员付费包括定期的会员费和单部剧集购买，主流长视频平台单月会员价格在22-25元，短剧专属平台会员费更高，在30元左右；单剧付费收费标准为1-3元/集，爆款剧单集收费可达10 元。广告收入也是短剧收入的重要组成部分，包括贴片广告、广告植入、IP 授权营销；其中，贴片广告是长视频平台的专属，软广植入是短视频平台的常用方式。

;

;总体来看，此种盈利模式依旧趋向短平快，离真正的成熟商业模式还有距离。

; Sat, 11 Nov 2023 14:55:03 +0800 此情可待成追忆：本师吴金华先生逝世十年祭http://www.infzm.com/contents/260212
;;2023-11-11 13:00:00;
;

;;

;

;复旦大学特聘教授、古籍所研究员吴金华先生（1943-2013）2007年12月访美时留影。 ;（何凌霞供图/图）;

;

;1997年，我从南京师范大学古文献专业本科毕业已过去了九年，某个春天的下午，怀抱着四岁的女儿上到四楼。在掏出钥匙开门的时候，刚过而立之年的我，从自己略显沉重的喘息中醒来。因为不甘心生命就此往下走，我决定要重新回到大学，以开始另一种成长。那一刻，我想到了您。

;

;事实上，大学毕业后，我已经有很长时间不再想起您了。

;

;读大学时见到的您，有一个欧洲僧侣般的秃顶，大大的眼镜后面的眼睛很精神，厚厚的嘴唇常带着笑意。除了夏天以外，似乎一直穿着蓝色或黑色的中山装，上面的口袋里总别着一两支笔。上一届的同学说见过您上课投入时用中山装的袖子擦黑板，您的课我们上得少，没在课堂上见过您这样做，不过我确实看到过您上完课后深色中山装的衣角、袖口、口袋等处沾满了粉笔灰的样子。我1984年考入南师，此前所遭受的各种莫名其妙的严厉管束，在宽容的大学里导致了强烈的逆反。那四年看一切都不入眼，自然也包括您。

;

;临近毕业，我对您的看法才有了很大的改变。我去您家接受毕业论文的指导，那是四年来仅有的单独交流。家里很挤，没有书桌，您招呼我在一张堆满了书的小圆饭桌旁坐下，开始谈我的论文。其间我一直被桌子正中摊着的一本《三国志集解》吸引着。翻开的书页上的空白处，用不同的笔写满了长长短短的校语。谈到后来，忘了为什么，好像是要找一个什么例子来作说明，您开始翻那本书。于是我看清了，那本书的每一页都写满了五颜六色的字。

;

;;

;

;吴金华先生批注的《三国志集解》。 ;（何凌霞供图/图）;

;

;很惭愧，那一天您就学术跟我谈了什么，后来很快忘记了，唯有这本书的样子还时不时想起。南师毕业后回到故乡常熟，只过了一两年，高傲便很自然地变成了颓废。此后的几年，我很少看书。天气不好的时候，漫无目的地在虞山麓尚湖滨游荡，任雨雪从头落下。努力劝自己，尝试跟三教九流各色人等没日没夜地打牌。越来越凶地抽烟，尤其是独处的时候。常常喝酒，深夜里醉了，一个人坐在马路边的黑暗中，默默地流泪。直到这个春天的下午，这一切才戛然而止。我决定重新开始，要长时间认真地去做一件事。当时再次浮现在眼前的，便是这本写满字的《三国志集解》。

;

;于是给您写信，我甚至都不知道您两年前已离开随园（编者注：南京师大老校区系袁枚随园旧址）。您从上海寄来的回信说，知道你想来读书，真是令人高兴。专业方面我们曾经学的那些，只要没有完全丢下，温习一下大概没有多少人能竞争，你要做的，应该是集中精力准备外语。那一年的冬天，考研前的最后两个月，天似乎一直在下雨，我将自己关在一个房间里，放下窗帘，收起钟表，朗读，背诵，默写，不分白天黑夜。

;

;考入复旦后第一次到您家，您从书房出来，因为保留的依然是十年前的记忆，您看上去老了不少，头发也更少了，不过眼睛依然精神。我说，我来得太晚了，十年前就应该来的。您马上满脸笑着说，不晚不晚，我也正是你这个年龄才开始的。

;

;第一年，您要我结合外语学习翻译日本学者的论文。在完成了译稿投出去前，您让我写一段译者按语。为了那几百字的按语，您反复批改了四五次。从一次次的沮丧中，我开始慢慢体会什么是“消极修辞”。最后改定时，您微笑着温和地说，看来离开学校太久了，已经不在状态了。不过没关系，就这样慢慢开始吧。

;

;第一个学年快结束的时候，您要我去图书馆借不同版本的《建康实录》，利用暑假的时间做校勘。开学后，我向您报告校勘的发现，您显得非常的高兴。我记得当时师母过来给我们倒水，您转过脸去很认真地对师母说，季忠平很用心，这本书我看了多少遍了，他发现的很多问题我都没看出来。

;

;;

;

;清贻训堂刊本《建康实录》。 ;（资料图/图）;

;

;再次来复旦读博士时，第一次谈博士论文选题，您介绍您所发现的一类利用经典文句所创造的词。我脱口而出，这类词的使用应该都是为了使修辞更典雅。您听了以后，用完全出乎我意料的夸张动作拍着大腿，说，太好了，这个认识太好了，这是你的发明。嗯，我们就把这一类的词起名为雅言词吧，你就做这个题目。第二天，我去文科楼上课，见到刚下课的师兄，对我说，老师在课上说你有一个重要的发明。又过了几天，遇到华东师范大学来的朋友，告诉我说，吴老师去他们学校开会，会上说我有一个了不起的发明。

;

;在复旦读书的那些年，这样一次次跟您长谈过后，深夜里回学校的路上，我总会时不时站起来狠踩自行车，恨不得下一秒就坐到书桌前。

;

;少年时看《福尔摩斯探案集》《三侠五义》之类的书，曾幻想长大后能成为追寻真相的侦探和铁面无私的法官，成年后才知道不切实际。您教我做校勘，做训诂，训练如何通过穷源竟委的调查以及殚精极虑的分析，作出信而有征的推断。为了真相穷追不舍，依据事实无所屈挠，一切取决于我。发现一个错字，好比揭露一个恶人；恢复一个原词，如同昭雪一起冤案。我坐在深夜的书桌前，犹如福尔摩斯坐在前去查案的马车中，又仿佛包拯坐在开封府衙的大堂上。我没有什么高才，能在世上获取富贵，也没有什么大志，想在人间成就伟大，我来到这世上，总得以某种方式活着，如果能在人畜无害以外，以这种感觉过完一生，我就已经心满意足。

;

;记得有一次，当我向您告别说我要走了，因为有朋友约好了要踢球，您问我，足球真的那么让你着迷吗？当时我只回答说是的。那一天我没有告诉您，我为什么对足球乐此不疲，因为那是我能参与的仅有的相对公平的游戏。在我们的球场上，唯有简单而明确的规则，只凭自身的技能与努力，一切都在阳光下，所有的权与势都毫无意义。我不会诗以外的功夫，只喜欢凭借自己的能力和热情参与这种游戏。只有这样的游戏才能让我真正感受生命的乐趣，尽管无人喝彩，也没有一分钱的收入，甚至随时有伤筋动骨的危险。我很肤浅，我所理解的学问跟踢球没有什么区别。虽然时至今日，我依然每周踢两次球，但我很清楚，有生之年，我的力量、速度必将渐渐消退，终有一日，我不能再在球场上纵情奔跑，不过，即使到了那时，我依然可以继续在书桌上感受同样的乐趣。

;

;我第一次见您时给您带了一点茶叶，您很认真地跟我说，下不为例，我们相处，不需要这些。如果你能写出文章来给我看，那比送我什么都好。从那以后，我能想到的报答，永远都只是能写点什么给您。在与您相处的日子里，我不记得一本正经当着您的面说过什么感恩的话。 2013年6月您猝然辞世，我从京都赶回上海，那天深夜独自一人从您家下来，坐在楼边的小花园里，后悔有很多的话没来得及当面对您说。

;

;我不知道今后我们能否在另一个世界再相见，如果不能，那么就再也没有当面说那些话的机会了，所以我不得已要拉杂写下上面这些文字，虽然只是其中很小的一部分，假若您魂而有灵，想必能理解我的心意。

;

;;

;

;吴金华与饶宗颐先生（图左），摄于1993年。 ;（何凌霞供图/图）;

;

;除了感恩以外，还有道歉。

;

;尽管来复旦读书，我的生活方式有了全新的变化，但自南师读书时期形成的某些信念未曾改变。那些信念在今天也许只是别人眼里的笑话，不过我愿意终身奉行。

;

;在复旦读硕士时，古籍整理研究所曾召集学生开会评定奖学金。会议有一个相当于自我申报的环节，前面发言的几位同学说自己做了什么，发表了什么，滔滔不绝，很热烈。我虽然也做了点研究，在刊物上发表了论文，但要我像他们那样去说，我开不了口。眼看着快要轮到我了，我赶紧站起来，拿起发给我的空白表格，交给主持会议的老师，说很惭愧，我觉得我跟他们比不了，我先退了。第二天，您打电话到我宿舍，很认真地对我说，本来只要你申请，你至少能得二等奖。这个很重要，下次不要这样。

;

;时至今日，我也还是没觉得这有什么重要。我的想法很简单，因为没有得这份奖，我也过下来了。需要申请才能得到的奖，能有什么荣誉可言呢。博士论文写出来后，您曾两次跟我说，等答辩完了我们去社科院申请吕叔湘奖，或者去北大申请王力奖。第一次我假装没听见，第二次我明确告诉您，我不会申请的。我在复旦读博士期间是得过一次文科的最高奖，但我从没想过要申请，那是您私下代我申请的。您在隔夜十一点后突然打电话告诉我说帮我申请过了，现在只需要我第二天去评奖会议作一个介绍。我犹豫了一会，勉强答应了。我当然知道这是您的一番苦心，我也实在不忍心在深夜里违忤你。第二天我只用了规定时间的一半，便草草地结束了不自在的自伐。离开会场的时候，我觉得浑身轻松，得不得奖我没放在心上，只是觉得我走完了这个过程，对您多少是个交代。

;

;我虽然很喜欢足球，但我很少主动约人踢球。因为我不喜欢别人由于我的邀约而勉强陪我。我不喜欢人虽在心却不在的状态，当然也不希望朋友这样。我们踢的比赛，都不过是一帮乌合之众凑起来的比赛，但大家身心合一，是没有任何足球以外的肮脏掺杂的比赛。虽然技术水平有限，但我自以为享受到的是真正的游戏的快乐。但凡要与那些足球以外的事物有粘连，多半会让我觉得不舒服。想到有一天身处尘世的我们都难免云收雨散，多少让人觉得有点伤感；但想到曾经的努力终将灰飞烟灭，我倒没有什么沮丧。每一次奔跑，每一次过人，每一次射门，竭尽全力之余，乐趣即在其中。从球场上下来的那一刻，我已享受完足球，今后的日子里跟我说我在那场比赛中如何如何，我其实没什么感觉。我很少记得曾经进过什么样的球，哪怕是昨天才踢的，每天念念不忘的，不过是去哪里开始下一场而已。我见识浅陋，无法为自己的职业赋予什么崇高的意义。我只希望所从事的研究，能像足球这样纯粹就好。

;

;;

;

;吴金华，1966年毕业于南京师范学院中文系，1968年分配至徐州地区赣榆县的中学任教。 1978年考回母校，师从徐复先生攻读汉语史专业研究生，1981年毕业留校任教，1986年获中国社会科学院青年语言学家奖二等奖，1991年晋升为教授，1995年调复旦大学古籍整理研究所，著有《三国志校诂》《世说新语考释》《古文献研究丛稿》《三国志丛考》等。 ;（资料图/图）;

;

;来读博士，我辞掉了原来的工作。第一个学期的10月初的假期里，您让我去您家吃饭。其间您问我毕业后对工作单位有没有什么要求。我说我无所谓，只要有一口饭吃就行了。您说，那你看是不是愿意留下来。我说那当然好，这样可以一直在您身边了。然后您说您相信我业务上不会有什么问题，但希望我能去做一些业务以外的事情，以确保能够留下来。我当场跟您说我不愿意，我只想凭自己的能力吃饭。此后您又有两次提及，我都明确拒绝。最后的一次，我甚至说如果一定要那样才能留下来，那我就去别的地方。如果非要那样才能做学术，那我宁愿从此去街上拉车扛包过日子。

;

;我知道那样说很狂妄无礼，事实上我从没见过也难以想象有人会那样跟您说话。我当然完全清楚您是为我的生活考虑，但照您说的去做，我夜里会难以入眠。这些信念自南师时便已根植在我心里，是我对自己许下的诺言，就算是在放浪形骸的时候，我也未曾有丝毫违背。或许，对别人来说，做那样的事不应该存在任何的疑惑，因为大家都是那么做的，但我是我，在我看来，做的人再多，也不可能改变这种事情的性质，我无法欺骗自己，所以我愿意接受自己选择的生活。我想，如果我们所做的考证是可信的话，那一定是凭借真实材料依据严密逻辑而作出的唯一判断。我奉行的那些信念，就是同样性质的不二判断。我不可能因为事实和逻辑以外的任何人的干预而作出改变，哪怕是您。

;

;您对学生很严厉，师母曾私下告诉我，甚至连几位年长的博士生，都曾被您训斥到当面哭泣。我不知道您为什么对我特别宽容，从来未曾有过疾言厉色，以至于我有恃无恐一次次地在您面前肆意放言，尤其是为了那些在他人眼里可笑的信念，而您总会温和地微笑着作一点劝告，最终则一定明确表示尊重我的选择。我承认，假如您还健在，我依然不会就上面这一类的事情向您道歉。因为我虽然倔强，但在我跟您读书的那段时光中，我在一定程度上是把您当成了这个世界的裁判官，我需要把事实跟您陈述清楚，然后从您那儿得到公正的裁决。不是我不尊敬您，而是我怕我的道歉，会改变您原本要作出的裁决。在我看来，那样的改判，即使对我有利，也已不再具有裁决的意义了。

;

;您去了另一个世界都已经十年了，我也早已不再需要您作任何的裁决了，所以，现在请接受我的道歉，我为以往的所有的放肆向您道歉。原谅我，二十多年前我只想回到曾经的桃花源，那时并不清楚，斗转星移，向往的地方也早已与时俱进，而我却始终像那个刻舟求剑的武士，固执地守着那个记号。原谅我，我不想活着只为了饭食，那与豚犬无异，我想要有酒的人生。您面对那些放肆而展现的温和笑容，是对一个不合时宜的孤独的学生的莫大安慰。

;

;人们常说一日为师，终身为父，那不过是说礼节，因为一天的交往，能有多少的感情呢。深厚的感情是长期互感以后产生的情的累积。我知道有与您不一样的老师，但师徒相处十几年，对我来说，您是唯一的。时至今日，我依然感到庆幸，当二十六年前的那个春天的下午我告别了安逸舒适而想要开始另一种成长后，您收养了我，如同父亲一样。

;This collective purchase 41 types of drugs were successfully purchased, and the prices of the selected drugs were reduced by an average of 58%, the second largest price reduction in history. Visual China | Picture

;

;If the company's market share in the next four years was determined within 12 hours, how would you choose?

;

;On the morning of Monday, November 6, 2023, the temperature in Shanghai dropped sharply, but there were crowds of people outside the Fengxian District Conference Center and the discussion was lively. The ninth batch of centralized bulk procurement of state-organized drugs is underway here, and representatives of various pharmaceutical companies carrying sealed quotation information materials are waiting anxiously.

;

;"We have ten manufacturers bidding together for our drug varieties, and the competition is fierce, (;Long procurement cycle;) is both a temptation and a challenge. I personally think it will prompt companies to further lower their quotations." A representative of a pharmaceutical company from Shangqiu, Henan told a reporter from Southern Weekend that the company is It was my first time to participate in the national centralized drug procurement, and I started preparing for this round of application since passing the consistency evaluation half a year ago.

;

;Starting at eight o'clock, business representatives poured into the first floor of the conference center. Within 12 hours, a total of 382 products from 262 companies participated in the bidding. The staff of the notary office will unseal, announce and read out the product specifications and quotations of each pharmaceutical company one by one, and then release the list of proposed winners; the proposed pharmaceutical companies will then Transfer to another hotel conference center to wait - enter into groups according to the order of drugs, and select and confirm the supply area in the next four-year procurement cycle.

;

;Southern Weekend reporters noticed that there were pharmaceutical distribution, local state-owned enterprises and other related enterprises inside and outside the site eagerly waiting for the event. Although these companies themselves are not participating in this collective purchase, they are also looking forward to the results of the ninth batch of collective purchases, especially if they can collide with some cooperation opportunities with the selected pharmaceutical companies.

;

;At about 19:00 on November 6, the National Medical Insurance Administration announced that 41 types of drugs were successfully purchased in this centralized purchase, and the average price of the selected drugs was reduced by 58%. It can save 18.2 billion yuan in drug costs every year - the second largest price reduction in history, second only to the previous record high of the first national procurement after the 4+7 pilot (59%).

;

;Once the bid is lost, it will be "sidelined" for the next four years

;

;The ninth batch of centralized procurement It covers medications for common and chronic diseases such as infections, tumors, cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, gastrointestinal diseases, and mental illnesses, as well as key drugs such as emergency drugs and shortage drugs. At present, during the period of high incidence of Mycoplasma pneumoniae infection, the much-anticipated azithromycin oral suspension is also on the list of this centralized purchase.

;

;What is different from the first eight batches of centralized procurement is that once selected, the procurement cycle will be extended from two years to four years, that is, from the implementation date to December 2027 March 31st. This is more attractive to pharmaceutical companies than in previous years. On the morning of November 6, many business representatives kept discussing the topic of extending the procurement cycle while waiting for declarations.

;

;While waiting, a representative of a Jiangxi pharmaceutical company looked embarrassed while holding a thick stack of written documents. "During the eighth batch of collective purchases, we did not win the selection for an exclusive product with a high market share, and most of the volume on the market was 'divided up' by several successful bidders. Therefore, we participated in this collective purchase, even if we 'cut the meat' We don’t want to lose the bid, we have to keep the production line.”

;

;Liu Hengwei, deputy general manager of the marketing center of Zhonghuan Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd., introduced to Southern Weekend reporters that the three projects they applied for Two products are planned to be selected. “Both are new products that have just been introduced into the Chinese market, and are also recommended drugs in the diagnosis and treatment guidelines. Although the current market sales are not large, it is expected to have a large growth in the next four years. Taking into account the patient Drug accessibility and hospitals will give priority to the centralized procurement of drugs from the winning bidders, and we have shown the greatest sincerity for this centralized procurement."

;

;Jiang Changsong, assistant to the dean of the National Medical Insurance Research Institute of Capital Medical University and director of the price procurement office, said that the procurement cycle of centralized procurement has been extended to four years for the first time, further ensuring The stability of drug use in medical institutions also means that if pharmaceutical companies "lose their bids", they will have to watch their huge market share "sideline" in the next four years. "National centralized drug procurement means large and stable quantities, and the supply cycle To ensure long-term growth, companies must exchange prices for volume and ensure supply."

;

;According to a report from the National Medical Insurance Administration, among the pharmaceutical companies participating in this centralized procurement, 266 products from 205 companies have been qualified for selection, including 200 domestic companies. 260 products from pharmaceutical companies and 6 products from 5 international pharmaceutical companies (;;;Including 1 original research drug and 5 imported generic drugs;), the proportion of bidding companies planning to be selected is about 78%, with an average of 6.5 companies planning to be selected for each variety.

;

;Amiodarone injection to treat arrhythmia, dopamine injection to rescue shock, oxytocin injection to induce labor, etc. 5 kinds of shortage medicines and emergency rescue For pharmaceuticals, we use the "volume-driven" procurement method to stabilize corporate expectations and achieve a balance between multiple goals of ensuring supply and reasonably reducing prices.

;

;;

;

;On the morning of November 6, 2023, representatives of pharmaceutical companies submitted application materials on the first floor of the Fengxian District Conference Center in Shanghai. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Huang Sizhuo

;

;Fierce battle: The battle for pharmaceutical companies’ supply areas

;

;November On the morning of the 6th, after the acceptance of application materials and the disclosure of application information ended, the companies to be selected could not relax their nerves because they would face another "fierce battle" that afternoon - the selection and confirmation of supply areas.

;

;According to the "National Drug Centralized Procurement Document" released by the National Drug Joint Procurement Office on October 13, 2023, the companies to be selected must first determine their main suppliers. Region, the first-ranked company will give priority to selecting one region among the supply regions. All companies to be selected will confirm the remaining regions in order. Each company will select one region at a time. Repeat the above process until all region selections are confirmed. The selection process for the reserve area is similar.

;

;At the same time, the purchase quantities of all drugs in different specifications in various provinces and regions are also announced, which can be used by applying companies to formulate constituency strategies accordingly.

;

;On the afternoon of November 6, two large conference rooms were prepared at the constituency site, one for business representatives to wait, and the other for confirming supply area information . The organizer calls the numbers one by one according to the drug types, and after checking the ID cards and authorization letters, the companies enter the selection areas in groups. This process starts around 14:00 that day and continues until the evening.

;

;Tian Yong, executive deputy general manager of Qilu Pharmaceutical Group Sales Corporation, told Southern Weekend reporters that there are multiple considerations for corporate constituencies. “First look at the donor district hospital report. How big the volume is? Secondly, it depends on the market capacity of the province. Thirdly, it depends on the importance that enterprises attach to different regions. For example, enterprises tend to choose Beijing, Shanghai and Guangzhou to enhance brand awareness. For example, our Shandong enterprises certainly want to choose the area at their doorstep, but they also Maybe he wasn’t selected and was picked by a company with a higher ranking.”

;

;Some business representatives also mentioned that some western provinces may not be popular in the electoral process due to low reporting volume and high distribution costs.

;

;Southern Weekend reporters noticed at the scene that after the first round of companies entered the conference hall to select areas, it took more than an hour for people to come out one after another. Representatives of pharmaceutical companies should adjust their constituency plans in a timely manner based on the conditions of their competitors. Someone not only recorded his own district selection, but also made notes on the district selection of other companies. The filled-in notes attracted onlookers. People competed to take photos.

;

;Determining the main drug supply and supply areas is largely to avoid situations where the centralized procurement of drugs cannot be supplied in sufficient quantity in time or the selected company is disqualified.

;

;"Starting from this year (;Collection of medicines to ensure supply;) Judging from the situation, it is much better than before." Gao Xiaoyan, deputy director of Shanghai No. 7 People's Hospital, told Southern Weekend reporters. Zhang Lan, director of the Pharmacy Department of Xuanwu Hospital of Capital Medical University (;hereinafter referred to as Xuanwu Hospital;), also said that hospitals all hope to collect drugs collectively Achieving quality and quantity supply requires the guarantee of a long-term mechanism, including the supervision and evaluation of winning bidders by relevant departments.

;

;;

;

;From the afternoon to the evening of November 6, 2023, the companies to be selected will enter the venue in groups according to drug types and select supply areas. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Huang Sizhuo

;

;Scientific and rational use of drugs attract attention

;

;"National Drugs From the beginning, centralized purchasing focused on large varieties, and now it has progressed to include all varieties that are clinically deemed necessary. In the implementation of each batch, Ruijin Hospital covers a relatively large number of varieties. So far, it has The procurement cycle of the first five batches of centralized medicines has been completed, and the sixth batch is in progress." Ruijin Hospital Affiliated to Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine (;The following Bian Xiaolan, director of the Pharmacy Department of Ruijin Hospital, said that medical institutions are now very concerned about how to use drugs more scientifically and rationally in the next step.

;

;Since 2018, the National Medical Insurance Administration has organized nine batches of national drug procurement, including a total of 374 kinds of drugs, with an average reduction of more than 50%. Zhang Lan, director of the Pharmacy Department of Xuanwu Hospital, said that centralized purchasing has been carried out on a regular basis, and clinicians have been observing the efficacy of centralized purchasing of generic drugs for some time. On the basis of respecting the patient's wishes, doctors will combine the diagnosis and treatment guidelines and the patient's condition to provide patients with Choose the right medication.

;

;In response to some voices saying that generic drugs selected through centralized purchasing may not be as effective as original drugs, Xuanwu Hospital has led a number of hospitals with strong research capabilities to conduct centralized purchasing and selection in batches. Real-world research on generic drugs. A recently published study covering 29 medical institutions in 16 provinces across the country and about 140,000 real cases showed that the clinical efficacy and safety of generic drugs selected through centralized procurement are equivalent to those of the original drugs (see Southern Weekend’s October 22 report for details;;"140,000 cases, 2-year PK, centralized purchasing of generic drugs What is the efficacy and safety?》;;).

;

;"Currently, (;generic drugs and Original drugs;) differences are within controllable range. Moreover, the drug configuration of different hospitals will be slightly different according to the actual situation. Our hospital tends to be equipped with both centralized drugs and original drugs, with the patient as the center and combining their needs. The medication plan will be comprehensively considered based on disease progression, past medication, etc.," Bian Xiaolan told Southern Weekend reporters.

;

;Ruijin Hospital selected endocrine metabolism-related drugs and cardiovascular and cerebrovascular drugs based on clinical characteristics, and participated in the second and third batches of national centralized procurement led by Xuanwu Hospital. Real-world studies of generic pharmaceuticals. Bian Xiaolan said that there are now more and more evaluation systems and tools. For example, Shanghai is developing a comprehensive drug clinical evaluation management system, and relevant research will be announced in the future.

;

;Zhang Lan introduced that real-world research on the fourth and fifth batches of generic drugs selected by the national centralized procurement has been launched, and the original data collection and reporting process will be more perfect in the future. Provide evidence-based support for clinical medication.
